m_szDocTitle: Stranded Asset Costs Already Outweigh Costs Of Climate Action, Says Ross Garnaut
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Stranded Asset Costs Already Outweigh Costs Of Climate Action, Says Ross Garnaut June 1st, 2015 by Giles Parkinson   Originally published on RenewEconomy . This is one carbon budget that Australia has already blown. Economist and climate change advisor Professor Ross Garnaut has delivered a withering critique of Australia’s economic policies and investment patterns, saying the cost of misguided over-investment in the recent mining boom would likely outweigh the cost of climate action over the next few decades.
